Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 92nd/Buffalo
ShortDescription: EB 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Houston, 91st, Burley & 92nd, due to street blockage near 92nd/Buffalo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Houston, 91st, Burley & 92nd, due to street blockage near 92nd/Buffalo.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
